-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Aviones"
(
    "idAvion" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Numero" text,
    "Modelo" text,
    "Peso" text,
    "Capacidad" bigint,
    PRIMARY KEY ("idAvion")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Hangares"
(
    "idHangar" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Numero" bigint,
    "Capacidad" bigint,
    "Localizacion" text,
    PRIMARY KEY ("idHangar")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Pilotos"
(
    "idPiloto" bigint NOT NULL,
    "NumeroLicencia" text,
    "Restricciones" text,
    "Salario" bigint,
    "Turno" text,
    PRIMARY KEY ("idPiloto")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."PilotoAviones"
(
    "idRelaciones" bigint NOT NULL,
    "idPiloto" bigint,
    "idAvion" bigint,
    PRIMARY KEY ("idRelaciones")
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."PilotoAviones"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("idPiloto")
    REFERENCES public."Pilotos" ("idPiloto") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."PilotoAviones"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("idAvion")
    REFERENCES public."Aviones" ("idAvion") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
